name: Cersei Lannister
text: Cersei Lannister does not kneel when declared as an attacker in an [intrigue] challenge. Reaction: After 1 or more cards are discarded from an opponent's hand, if you do not support that player, Cersei Lannister gains 1 power. (Limit 3 times per round.)

name: Tyrion Lannister
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge, return an attacking Clansman character to your hand to (choose one): draw 2 cards, gain 3 gold, or raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 until the end of the challenge. (Limit twice per phase.)

flavor: "The Burned Men fear nothing. Timett Son of Timett will ride with the lions."
name: Timett Son of Timett
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Timett Son of Timett is attacking, choose and kill a character with printed cost X or lower. X is the number of Clansman characters you control.

name: Ser Jaime Lannister
text: Each Knight character you control gains renown while attacking alone. Challenges Action: Choose a Kingsguard character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains an [intrigue] icon. (Limit once per phase.)

flavor: "...when your enemies defy you, you must serve them steel and fire."
name: Tywin Lannister
text: Pillage. Interrupt: When exactly 1 card is discarded from a player's deck, instead look at the top 2 cards of that player's deck and discard 1.

name: Chella Daughter of Cheyk
text: Chella Daughter of Cheyk gets +1 STR for each ear token she has. While she has 3 or more ear tokens, she gains intimidate and renown. Reaction: After a character is killed during a challenge in which Chella Daughter of Cheyk is attacking, place an ear token on her.

name: Ser Gregor's Marauders
text: Pillage. Reaction: After Ser Gregor's Marauders discards an event using pillage, stand Ser Gregor's Marauders.

name: Shagga Son of Dolf
text: While Shagga Son of Dolf is in your hand, he gains ambush (o) if you control a Clansman character or Tyrion Lannister. Forced Reaction: After Shagga Son of Dolf enters play using ambush, choose and kill a [lannister] character you control.

name: Moon Brothers
text: Action: During a challenge in which you control an attacking Clansman character, kneel your faction card to put Moon Brothers into play from your hand (standing), participating as an attacker.

name: Red Keep Spy
text: Ambush (4). Reaction: After Red Keep Spy enters play using ambush, choose a character with printed cost 3 or lower. If you have more cards in hand than that character's controller, return it to its owner's hand.

flavor: "My lord will find my tongue well schooled. When I was a girl I learned when to use it, and when not."
name: Alayaya
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Alayaya is participating, move 1 gold from the losing opponent's gold pool to your own.

flavor: At sixteen, he was cursed with all the certainty of youth, unleavened by any trace of humor or self-doubt, and wed to the arrogance that came so naturally to those born blond and strong and handsome.
name: Ser Lancel Lannister
text: While you control exactly 1 other [lannister] Lord or Lady character, Ser Lancel Lannister gets +X STR, where X is that character's STR.

flavor: "When I'm king in my own right, I'm going to outlaw beets."
name: Tommen Baratheon
text: Each player with no cards in his or her hand cannot gain power from challenge bonuses (unopposed and rivals).

name: Golden Tooth
text: Limited. Action: Kneel Golden Tooth to gain 1 gold. (3 gold instead if an opponent has no cards in his or her hand.)

flavor: Shadowcats prowled those passes, rock slides were common, and the mountain clans were lawless brigands...
name: Mountains of the Moon
text: Reaction: After a Clansman character enters play, that character gains a challenge icon of your choice until the end of the phase.

name: Lannisport Treasury
text: Reaction: After the taxation phase begins, place 1 gold from your gold pool on Lannisport Treasury. Marshaling Action: Kneel Lannisport Treasury to move any number of gold from Lannisport Treasury to your gold pool.

name: Shield of Lannisport
text: [lannister] Lord or Lady character only. While you control no Lord or Lady characters with printed cost 4 other than attached character, attached character gets +2 STR and gains renown. +1 Income.

name: Insidious Scheme
text: Reaction: After claim is applied for an [intrigue] challenge you won by 5 or more STR, draw 2 cards. (4 cards instead if the losing opponent has no cards in his or her hand.)

name: Daring Rescue
text: Play only if you control a Knight character. Challenges Action: Return a character you control to its owner's hand. Then, have a Knight character you control gain ? power.

flavor: "I won't go pray to the Lord of Light. I am a Warrior's man, like my father."
name: Edric Storm
text: Reaction: After the dominance phase begins, choose a character. That character does not contribute its STR to its controller's total for dominance this phase.

name: Disputed Claim
text: Bastard, Lord, or Lady character only. While you have more power on your faction card than each opponent, attached character gets +2 STR and gains renown.

name: Victarion Greyjoy
text: Intimidate. Renown. Interrupt: When Victarion Greyjoy would be killed, discard 2 power from him to save him.

flavor: The slender blond steward they called Sweet Donnel had laid a shaft just off the bull's eye at fifly yards.
name: Sweet Donnel Hill
text: No attachments except Weapon. While Sweet Donnel Hill is defending, each attacking character loses all keywords.

flavor: At the Bridge of Skulls he had met the Weeper and three hundred wildlings and won a bloody battle.
name: Bridge of Skulls
text: Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, choose an opponent who did not initiate a military challenge against you this phase. That player discards one card at random from his or her hand.

flavor: "I shall be a good and true wife to Robb, I swear. And as wise a queen as I can."
name: Jeyne Westerling
text: Action: Kneel Jeyne Westerling to choose and stand a [stark] King or Lord character.

flavor: "...the Umbers may seem simple, but they are not without a certain low cunning." <cite>Roose Bolton</cite>
name: Last Hearth Scouts
text: Forced Reaction: After a character enters play during the challenges phase, kneel that character.

flavor: "I am a knight... I shall die a knight."
name: Ser Barristan Selmy
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Ser Barristan Selmy is participating, if you have fewer cards in hand than the losing opponent, stand him.

name: Daenerys's Favor
text:
[targaryen] character only.
While attached character is participating in a challenge, each other participating character gets -1 STR.

flavor: Sansa recognized only Lord Tyrell's tall dignified wife, Lady Alerie, whose long silvery braid was bound with jeweled rings.
name: Alerie Tyrell
text: Reaction: After Alerie Tyrell enters play, search the top 10 cards of your deck for a [tyrell] character with printed cost 3 or lower, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

name: High Septon
text: Interrupt: When an opponent chooses a character you control as the only target of a triggered ability, choose an eligible The Seven character you control to become the target of that triggered ability instead. (Limit once per phase.)

flavor: The Warrior stands before the foe, protecting us where e'er we go. With sword and shield and spear and bow, he guards the little children.
name: Devout Freerider
text: During the challenges phase, each player cannot gain gold.

name: Wildling Bandit
text: While Wildling Bandit is attacking an opponent with more gold in his or her gold pool than you, it gets +2 STR.

name: Ocean Road
text: Limited. Marshaling Action: Kneel Ocean Road to reduce the cost of the next neutral or out-of-faction card you marshal this phase by 1.

flavor: "So the king has decreed. The small council consents." <cite>Grand Maester Pycelle</cite>
name: The Council Consents
text: Reaction: After a player wins an intrigue challenge by 5 or more STR, stand each Small Council character.

name: "The Rains of Castamere"
text: Your plot deck must be 12 cards, including exactly 5 different Scheme cards. During the plot phase, Scheme cards are not considered to be in your plot deck. Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge by 5 or more STR, kneel your faction card to reveal a Scheme plot. If that card leaves play, remove it from the game. Card Design by 2013 Joust World Champion, √Ålvaro Rodriguez

name: Lions of the Rock
text: Reaction: After the challenges phase begins, gain 3 gold.

name: Unexpected Delay
text: Forced Reaction: After the challenges phase begins, each player chooses a character without attachments or power. Return each of those characters to its owner's hand.

name: Summoned to Court
text: Forced Interrupt: When the draw phase ends, each player chooses a card in his or her hand, if able. Then, reveal the chosen cards. Each player who revealed a character with the lowest printed cost may put that character into play.

name: Littlefinger's Meddling
text: Reduce the cost of each event you play by 2.

name: Gossip and Lies
text: Each character you control does not kneel when declared as an attacker in the first [intrigue] challenge you initiate during the challenges phase.
